summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeHOURGLASS Curator Palettes are artfully curated eyeshadow quads with velvety matte, satin, shimmer and metallic finishes offering buildable, multi-dimensional eye looks.
details: DetailsFeaturesTalc-free, finely milled powdersHighly pigmentedBuildable colorComfortable and non-dryingGlides onto lids & easily blendsVelvety, smooth texturesFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesTalcMineral oilGlutenShadesShimmer Pearlescent PinkSatin Soft CoralShimmer Rose GoldMatte RosewoodFINISHESMATTE: rich, velvet matte finishSATIN: satin finish with a subtleluminositySHIMMER: pearlescent shimmer finishMETALLIC: multi-dimensional, metallic finishItem 2641227How To UseShades can be used alone or layered to create a multidimensional look.ALL-OVER PLACEMENT: Nº 3 All Over Shadow BrushDEFINITION: Nº 9 Domed Shadow BrushSHADING: Nº 12 Beveled Shadow BrushBLENDING IN CONTOURS AND CREASES: Nº 6 Tapered Blender BrushDIFFUSING INTO LASH LINE: Nº 11 Smudge BrushARTISTRY TIPSWhether you're going for an effortless daytime look or a bold nighttime look, these quads can be customized for any mood. For an all-matte look: use the Minimalist palette. For a bold, metallic look - or to layer on extra shimmer - use the Expressionist palette. To curate your own look, mix and match the Realist, Futurist, Modernist, and Idealist palettes.To amplify metallic shades, use a wet brush to intensify the color payoff.Complete every look with Hourglass's Voyeur liners and Unlocked Instant Extensions Mascara or Caution Extreme Mascara.IngredientsShade 1: Mica, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Magnesium Myristate, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shade 2: Mica, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Magnesium Myristate, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shade 3: Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Nylon-12, Magnesium Myristate, Boron Nitride, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, Silica, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shade 4: Mica, Polyethylene, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Zinc Stearate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shades can be used alone or layered to create a multidimensional look.ALL-OVER PLACEMENT: Nº 3 All Over Shadow BrushDEFINITION: Nº 9 Domed Shadow BrushSHADING: Nº 12 Beveled Shadow BrushBLENDING IN CONTOURS AND CREASES: Nº 6 Tapered Blender BrushDIFFUSING INTO LASH LINE: Nº 11 Smudge BrushARTISTRY TIPSWhether you're going for an effortless daytime look or a bold nighttime look, these quads can be customized for any mood. For an all-matte look: use the Minimalist palette. For a bold, metallic look - or to layer on extra shimmer - use the Expressionist palette. To curate your own look, mix and match the Realist, Futurist, Modernist, and Idealist palettes.To amplify metallic shades, use a wet brush to intensify the color payoff.Complete every look with Hourglass's Voyeur liners and Unlocked Instant Extensions Mascara or Caution Extreme Mascara.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Gifted by hourglass cosmetics for my honest review and thoughts. These palettes are the perfect way to bring a whole look with you on the go and I have been loving it for summer travels. The shadows are buildable and blend really well

reviews.headline: So good
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with this palette! It's the perfect neutral tones and makes it so easy to put together a look with little effort. I received this complimentary from Hourglass but would pay for it 10 times over! Love it so much.

reviews.headline: Amazing  eyeshadow palette!
reviews.comments: This eyeshadow palette is fantastic ! It includes all the colors you need for full and soft glam looks . The shimmer shades are so beautiful. I got the eyeshadow color way Expressionist. It's so easy to apply and blends beautifully . I highly recommend getting this eyeshadow palette ! Gifted by hourglasscosmetics

reviews.headline: this is my new fav palette
reviews.comments: I just got the new Curator Eyeshadow Palette in the Futurist shades complimentary from Hourglass cosmetics, and this is my new favorite pallette. The colors go with everything, and blend like magic. And did I mention how little fallout there is? This is great.

reviews.headline: Nothing special!
reviews.comments: Gifted by Hourglass to give my honest thoughts and opinions! Wow, I love the metal casing of this palette. The color of the metal is nice and it just simply says Hourglass on it. The small quad palette fits in my hand, so it is small. I don't mind that, it will be great for travel. I was disappointed when I swatched the shades, they felt dry. I was expecting a buttery feel to them. The shadow shades are not anything new. We have seen these colors many times. Don't get me wrong, I like this color story. I was just expecting the formula to be so much more! Especially considering the price and the brand! The shades in here are all metallic. Honestly the formula meh nothing special and the shades are not like wow they stand out! Overall, Yes the shadows still work, but again I was expecting so much more considering both the brand and price!

reviews.headline: exceed expectations
reviews.comments: I didn't expect this small eyeshadow palette to exceed my expectations, but it really did. The colors are beautifully cohesive, and the glitter is stunning. The formula is soft and smooth, and once it settles, it stays put for hours without creasing. It's complimentary from hourglass cosmetics

reviews.headline: Such a nice palette!
reviews.comments: I received the curator eyeshadow palette gifted by hourglasscosmetics and have enjoyed using these eyeshadow shades so far! I really like how this is a color palette that resonates with me. The formula is amazing and creates amazing eyeshadow looks.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with this Hourglass eyeshadow palette! The earthy tones are gorgeous, and the shimmer shades add a lovely touch. The shadows are a breeze to apply and stay put all day, making it a fantastic addition to my makeup collection. Complimentary from hourglasscosmetics

I'm in love with this palette in the shade Modernist. The colors are so flattering and blend like a dream. It's perfect for both everyday looks and something more dramatic in the evening. Makes my eyes pop without trying too hard. I got it gifted by Hourglass. The packaging feels super luxe too such a little gold treasure in my makeup bag.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments:
In love with the curator eyeshadow palette, so luxurious, the colors are so beautiful , pigmented and easy to blend I love the shades they are so wearables and the packaging is gorgeous and easy to take with you anywhere 
Gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: Beautiful
reviews.comments: I really like this eyeshadow palette. It is beautiful nuetral shades of brown. It is a great every day palette. This shades are pigmented and buildable. I like the packaging and highly recommend this eyeshadow palette. Gifted by Hourglass Cosmetics

reviews.headline: Realist is stunning!!
reviews.comments: These have just the perfect amount of pigment! You don't have to be careful about picking up a tiny amount because they are so easy to blend. I used all four of the realist shades and it created the perfect natural slightly smoky eye. This was offered by hourglasscosmetics

reviews.headline: Stunning palette
reviews.comments: Absolutely stunning little eye palette. Gorgeous gold packaging that really elevates it. The shimmery shades are really stunning on the eye and a great topper or finisher for a look. They are a bit hard to blend out, but the formula is super soft and didn't cause any flaky fall out under the eyes. Overall I highly recommend this I love it! Gifted by hourglass cosmetics

reviews.headline: Amazing palette!
reviews.comments: Hourglass did it again! I can't get over how gorgeous this Curator Eyeshadow palette is! I have Realist and this palette includes matte, satin, shimmer and metallic shadows! Peach Beige, Dusty Rose, Bronzed Rose With Gold Pearls and Bronze. These 4 colors are gorgeous! I absolutely love that I am able to use this to switch up my looks from day to night! They blend out so beautifully and are super easy to use! I also love the gold packaging! Such a perfect everyday palette! Gifted by hourglasscosmetics

reviews.headline: Amazing Palette!
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with the tones in the Futurist palette. The mix of shimmer and matte shades is so pretty and super easy to blend. The pigment is really strong, but still buildable, and the formula feels super smooth going on. I've worn it for hours without any creasing. It's become one of my favorite palettes for cooler-toned looks that still feel soft and wearable. gifted by Hourglass

reviews.headline: Impressed
reviews.comments: complimentary from Hourglass Cosmetics. I am very impressed with this eyeshadow. When it first arrived, I thought it was going to be ashy, but it was pigmented. I wish that there was more glitter in the shadow to match the product photo, but overall a pretty neutral palette

reviews.headline: Pigment is a little light
reviews.comments: Gifted by Hourglass. This is a very beautiful eyeshadow quad . The colors are bright and beautiful however the pigment is a little light . Perfect for a job interview or work day. This palette is best for day looks .

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Gifted by hourglass for free and exchange for my honest opinion I love this eyeshadow palette. The shades are so pretty and blend super well the packaging is also very luxurious and has a mirror which I love highly recommend

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I was hoping for a great quality palette but it seems that the eyeshadow is pretty drying and has a short span on eyelids without primer. It nice all 4 colors work together seamlessly but the quality could be more. Complimentary from hourglasscosmetics

reviews.headline: Very cute
reviews.comments: Huge thanks to Hourglass who kindly gifted me this beautiful eyeshadow palette.It's absolutely gorgeous.The colors are very versatile and pretty and the formula is nice.It might be a little overpriced but I still love it.

media.headline: I would choose another tone
media.caption: I like that it comes with a mirror included

media.headline: I would choose another tone
media.caption: with natural light they look pretty

media.headline: My go to for classic looks!

faceoff_positive.comments: The Hourglass Curator Eyeshadow Palette in the shade Idealist is pure luxury from start to finish. The packaging is sleek, elegant, and feels high-end exactly what you'd expect from Hourglass. But it's the formula and color payoff that truly steal the show. Idealist is the most stunning warm-toned neutral with just the right touch of sophistication. It's incredibly versatile , perfect for a soft daytime look or built up for something more dramatic. The texture is buttery smooth, blends effortlessly, and wears like a dream with zero creasing or fallout. What I love most is the clean, vegan formula that doesn't compromise on performance. It's pigmented, long-lasting, and flattering on every skin tone. I've received so many compliments every time I wear it! Whether you're curating your perfect palette or looking for a standout single shade, Idealist is a must-have. Worth every penny . I'm obsessed! "Complimentary from hourglasscosmetics"
faceoff_positive.headline: Luxury in Every Swipe – Shade Idealist is Perfection!

faceoff_negative.comments: Gifted by Hourglass to give my honest thoughts and opinions! Wow, I love the metal casing of this palette. The color of the metal is nice and it just simply says Hourglass on it. The small quad palette fits in my hand, so it is small. I don't mind that, it will be great for travel. I was disappointed when I swatched the shades, they felt dry. I was expecting a buttery feel to them. The shadow shades are not anything new. We have seen these colors many times. Don't get me wrong, I like this color story. I was just expecting the formula to be so much more! Especially considering the price and the brand! The shades in here are all metallic. Honestly the formula meh nothing special and the shades are not like wow they stand out! Overall, Yes the shadows still work, but again I was expecting so much more considering both the brand and price!
faceoff_negative.headline: Nothing special!
